name: Aaargh! Condor
description:
TAKE CHARGE OF THE HEROES AND FACE OFF AGAINST THE CONDOR TO SAVE THE SACRIFICES.

IF YOU CAN GET TO THE SPEAR, AIM AT THE ONCOMING BIRD AND LAUNCH YOUR SPEAR.

MAY IT STRIKE TRUE.

___________________________________

Aaargh! Condor was originally a 1983 Commodore 64 game made by Alan G. Osborne and released by Games Machine Ltd. This unofficial 35th anniversary remake brings the frantic action to contemporary Windows computes. 

Phil Salvador of the Obscuritory wrote a blog post about the original that introduced me to the game and is worth consulting.

Aaargh! Condor 2018 is fully gamepad compatible.

The "AAARGH! CONDOR" logo is adapted from the box art for the original game. The font used in the game is Crypt of Tomorrow by anna anthropy.
